Key Match Events: Cameron Green scored 61 runs for Australia
Hardik Pandya scored 71 runs for India
Post-Match Reflections: Cameron Green was named Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Punjab Cricket Association IS Bindra Stadium, Mohali, Chandigarh
Others: Australia won the match by 4 wickets with 4 balls remaining
The series result was Australia led the 3-match series 1-0
